tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_variations (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  chromosome_number INT,
  variation_type VARCHAR(50),
  population_frequency FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE GenomicData (
  genetic_variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  chromosome VARCHAR(10),
  position INT,
  nucleotide_change VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE GenomicData (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
population_id INT,
chromosome_number INT,
base_pair_start INT,
base_pair_end INT,
base_pair_sequence VARCHAR(200));

CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
genomic_data_id INT,
result_type VARCHAR(100),
result_description TEXT);
